products.title: Electric Blackout Titan Harbour Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Style doesnt get much more contemporary than this slick roller, with its deep grey shade and clean-cut finish. The perfect choice for a modern space, it has just as much substance as style. An acrylic coating on the reverse makes the fabric blockout for incredible shadin style doesnt get much more contemporary than this slick roller, with its deep grey shade and clean-cut finish.

products.title: Electric Blackout Titan Simply Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Cool, clean and stylish, this crisp grey roller is the perfect neutral for a modern space. The contemporary look is matched by contemporary design too; blockout for great shading and perfect privacy, hardwearing and reliable - its even remote controlled too. Raising and cool, clean and stylish, this crisp grey roller is the perfect neutral for a modern space.
